PROMPTSETDATA.DATAEDITOR: <PRPTS ontop="1"><PRPTBOX><TEXTFIELD1s.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="TEXTFIELD1#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">lat</TEXTFIELD1s.00></PRPTBOX></PRPTS>

NOTIFICATION.Subject: <Will be replaced by Process.>
NOTIFICATION.Text:
&tt
&ht
&c1#&$SYSTEM#
&c2#&$CLIENT# (&$CLIENT_DESC#)
&c3#&UC_CAUSE_NAME
&c4#&UC_CAUSE_NR
&c5#&statustext# (&UC_CAUSE_STATE)
&c6#&UC_CAUSE_RETCODE
&c7#&date# &time#
&c8#&parentname#
&c9#&parenttyp#
&ca#&parentnr#

© Automic Software GmbH

SCRIPT.MSCRI: :read &UC_CAUSE_NAME,,, :read &UC_CAUSE_NR,,, :read &UC_CAUSE_STATE,,, :read &UC_CAUSE_RETCODE,,, ! :set &lang# = SYS_USER_LANGUAGE :if &lang# = 'E' : put_att SUBJECT = "Alarm:'&UC_CAUSE_NAME' RunID:'&UC_CAUSE_NR' Client:'&$client#'" : set &tt = "Notification" : set &ht = "&$SYSTEM# has important information for you!" : set &c1#="System name" : set &c2#="Client" : set &c3#="Object" : set &c4#="Run Id" : set &c5#="State (Text)" : set &c6#="Return code" : set &c7#="Time" : set &c8#="Parent object" : set &c9#="Parent type" : set &cA#="Parent run Id" :endif ! :if &lang# = 'D' : put_att SUBJECT = "Alarm:'&UC_CAUSE_NAME' RunID:'&UC_CAUSE_NR' Mandant:'&$client#'" : set &tt = "Benachrichtigung" : set &ht = "&$SYSTEM# hat eine wichtige Information fr Sie!" : set &c1#="System Name" : set &c2#="Mandant" : set &c3#="Objekt" : set &c4#="Run Id" : set &c5#="Status (Text)" : set &c6#="Return Code" : set &c7#="Uhrzeit" : set &c8#="Parent Objekt" : set &c9#="Parent Typ" : set &cA#="Parent Run Id" :endif ! :if &lang# = 'F' : put_att SUBJECT = "Alarm:'&UC_CAUSE_NAME' RunID:'&UC_CAUSE_NR' Client:'&$client#'" : set &tt = "Notification" : set &ht = "Une erreur s'est produite!" : set &c1#="System" : set &c2#="Client" : set &c3#="Objet" : set &c4#="Run Id" : set &c5#="Statut" : set &c6#="Retcode" : set &c7#="Heure" : set &c8#="Parent Objet" : set &c9#="Parent Type" : set &cA#="Parent Run Id" :endif ! :set &parentname# = SYS_ACT_PARENT_NAME('ACT') :set &parentnr# = SYS_ACT_PARENT_NR('ACT') :set &parenttyp# = SYS_ACT_PARENT_TYP('ACT') :set &date# = SYS_DATE_PHYSICAL('YYYY-MM-DD') :set &time# = SYS_TIME_PHYSICAL("HH:MM:SS") :set &statustext# = get_msg_txt(&UC_CAUSE_STATE,'')

DOCU_Docu.DOC: This job updates the staging tables for merchandise hierarchy.

XHEADER.Title: Pim Wh Export - file from PIM to WH
Pim Wh Import - file from PIM to WH

NOTIFICATION.Subject: <Will be replaced by Process.>
NOTIFICATION.Text:
&ht
&c1#&$SYSTEM#
&c2#&$CLIENT# (&$CLIENT_DESC#)
&c3#&UC_CAUSE_NAME
&c4#&UC_CAUSE_NR
&c5#&statustext# (&UC_CAUSE_STATE)
&c6#&UC_CAUSE_RETCODE
&c7#&date# &time#
&c8#&parentname#
&c9#&parenttyp#
&ca#&parentnr#

SCRIPT.MSCRI: :read &UC_CAUSE_NAME,,, :read &UC_CAUSE_NR,,, :read &UC_CAUSE_STATE,,, :read &UC_CAUSE_RETCODE,,, ! :set &lang# = SYS_USER_LANGUAGE :if &lang# = 'E' : put_att SUBJECT = "Alarm:'&UC_CAUSE_NAME' RunID:'&UC_CAUSE_NR' Client:'&$client#'" : set &ht = "&$SYSTEM# has important information for you!" : set &c1#="System name" : set &c2#="Client" : set &c3#="Object" : set &c4#="Run Id" : set &c5#="State (Text)" : set &c6#="Return code" : set &c7#="Time" : set &c8#="Parent object" : set &c9#="Parent type" : set &cA#="Parent run Id" :endif ! :if &lang# = 'D' : put_att SUBJECT = "Alarm:'&UC_CAUSE_NAME' RunID:'&UC_CAUSE_NR' Mandant:'&$client#'" : set &ht = "&$SYSTEM# hat eine wichtige Information fr Sie!" : set &c1#="System Name" : set &c2#="Mandant" : set &c3#="Objekt" : set &c4#="Run Id" : set &c5#="Status (Text)" : set &c6#="Return Code" : set &c7#="Uhrzeit" : set &c8#="Parent Objekt" : set &c9#="Parent Typ" : set &cA#="Parent Run Id" :endif ! :if &lang# = 'F' : put_att SUBJECT = "Alarm:'&UC_CAUSE_NAME' RunID:'&UC_CAUSE_NR' Client:'&$client#'" : set &ht = "Une erreur s'est produite!" : set &c1#="System" : set &c2#="Client" : set &c3#="Objet" : set &c4#="Run Id" : set &c5#="Statut" : set &c6#="Retcode" : set &c7#="Heure" : set &c8#="Parent Objet" : set &c9#="Parent Type" : set &cA#="Parent Run Id" :endif ! :set &parentname# = SYS_ACT_PARENT_NAME('ACT') :set &parentnr# = SYS_ACT_PARENT_NR('ACT') :set &parenttyp# = SYS_ACT_PARENT_TYP('ACT') :set &date# = SYS_DATE_PHYSICAL('YYYY-MM-DD') :set &time# = SYS_TIME_PHYSICAL("HH:MM:SS") :set &statustext# = get_msg_txt(&UC_CAUSE_STATE,'')
